name: Donovan the Thief
description:
Donovan is a sly and secretive child, tricking his peers into stealing from their caregivers.

This was an entry I submitted for Inkle Studio's contest, Campfire Tales for Pendragon. The winning stories can be visited on their website, and I hope you enjoy the short piece that I put together for this wonderful opportunity!

Special thanks to all those who supported me through this contest, and to Inkle Studios for hosting an incredible way for writers everywhere!
